title: Butterfly Café
description: In Butterfly Café a young girl prepares a "café" for future monarch butterflies to visit. The stages of plant development are briefly told through the narration. Detailed illustrations support the text.
reviewWords: café, customers, milkweed, monarch, nectar, plant, shelter, soil, sprouts
comprehension: Sequence Events                : Identify the sequence of events in a story
grammar: Present-Tense Verbs                : Recognize and correctly use present-tense verbs in a sentence
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency word our
